      • SaveLoadManager

        public SaveLoadManager​(boolean isSave)
        constructor of the save load manager
        Parameters:
        isSave - true to fetch the latest CameraManager.state_CamInfo_list, GObjectManager.gObjectList, and StateManager.getTotal_State_Number() to be ready to save data.
